Generated Narrative: StructureDefinition EHDSInpatientEncounter

NameFlagsCard.TypeDescription & Constraints
EHDSInpatientEncounter 0..*BaseInpatient encounter model
Instances of this logical model can be the target of a Reference
encounterType 1..1CodeableConceptC.23.1 - Encounter type
Binding Description (No ValueSet): (preferred): hl7v3:ActEncounterCode

encounterNote 0..1NarrativeC.23.2 - Encounter note
admission 1..1BaseC.23.3 - Admission
urgency 0..1CodeableConceptC.23.3.1 - Urgency
Binding Description (No ValueSet): (preferred): hl7:v3-xEncounterAdmissionUrgency

date 1..1dateTimeC.23.3.2 - Date
admitter 0..1Reference(Health professional model)C.23.3.3 - Admitter
admitSource 0..1CodeableConceptC.23.3.4 - Admit Source
Binding Description (No ValueSet): (preferred): hl7:admit-source

referringProfessional 0..1Reference(Health professional model)C.23.3.5 - Referring professional
admissionReason 0..*Reference(Condition model | Procedure model | Observation model)C.23.3.6 - Admission reason
admissionReasonComment 0..1NarrativeC.23.3.7 - Admission reason comment
admissionLegalStatus 0..1CodeableConceptC.23.3.8 - Admission legal status
Binding Description (No ValueSet): (preferred): SNOMED CT

discharge 1..1BaseC.23.4 - Discharge
date 1..1dateTimeC.23.4.1 - Date
destinationType 0..1CodeableConceptC.23.4.2 - Destination type
Binding Description (No ValueSet): (preferred): hl7.discharge-disposition

destinationLocation 0..1Reference(Organization model | Location model)C.23.4.3 - Destination location
location 0..*BaseC.23.5 - Location
period 1..1PeriodC.23.5.1 - Period
organizationPart 1..1EHDSLocationC.23.5.2 - Organization part

Documentation for this format

name: EHDSInpatientEncounter
title: Inpatient encounter model
description: C.23 - EHDS refined base model for Inpatient encounter

element.definition: C.23 - EHDS refined base model for Inpatient encounter
The type of the encounter whether inpatient or short stay encounter.
A narrative description of the encounter course.
Admission details
Admission type, either emergency or planned
Admission date and time.
Admitting Healthcare Professional
From where the patient was admitted (e.g. physician referral, transfer).
Referring Healthcare Professional
Reason or reasons for admission, e.g. Problem, procedure or finding.
Explanation of the reason for the encounter.

Legal status/situation at admission. The legal status indicates the basis on which the patient is staying in a healthcare organisation. This can be either voluntary or involuntary, however the legal status is always determined by a court. A patient can also receive healthcare based on a forensic status. (voluntary, involuntary, admission by legal authority).
Discharge details
Discharge date and time
Type of location to which the patient will go after the encounter. E.g. home, hospital, nursing home, left against medical advice etc.
The location/organisation to which the patient will go after the encounter. Name, address and telecommunication contact.
All locations/departments where the patient stayed (was boarded) within the hospital.
Time period during which the patient was present at the location
Organization or organization part (hospital department) where the patient was present.
